page.title: 03Cold Norton Golf Course.
page.content: The golf couse has a public foot path where people can walk.If you take your dog it must stay on the lead.You get a lot of golfers at a weekend.There is a house at the top of a hill overlooking the golf course (Beacon Hill), which at the moment is owned by Mrs Hawes who is one of the teachers at our school. The golf course belongs to the Three Rivers Country Club.Quite alot of people play golf there and is the main reason that people outside Cold Norton have hard of the village. There are three ponds which make the area look quite attractive . When the school has its' May Fair the Cross Country Race in the morning goes across the Golf Course , which seems to annoy some of the Golfers.
